name: Paper Ship
description:
Made in Global Game Jam 2017 (48h) with the theme "Waves"

Surf the river and feel the waves. Be very careful not to crash!

Credits:

Rosa B. Iglesias (@Salmoreja3d): graphics

Matias Lizana (@matias_lizana): music and sound effects

Jorge Pedraza (@Deebrol): code and scene composition

Place: Córdoba (Spain) @gamejamodb

Note: The game was made at intervals the saturday due to the mentoring tasks.
